caro.title: Christina's World
caro.description: Christina's World is a 1948 painting by American painter Andrew Wyeth and one of the best-known American paintings of the middle 20th century.

caro.title: Mona Lisa
caro.description: The Mona Lisa is a half-length portrait painting by the Italian Renaissance artist Leonardo da Vinci.

caro.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
caro.description: Girl with a Pearl Earring is an oil painting by Dutch Golden Age painter Johannes Vermeer, dated c. 1665.
